org.apache.juneau.utils

Class ClasspathResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.utils.ClasspathResourceManager

  • public final class ClasspathResourceManager
extends Object
    Class for retrieving and caching resource files from the classpath.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Constructor.

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClasspathResourceManager

        public ClasspathResourceManager(Class<?> baseClass,
                                ClasspathResourceFinder resourceFinder,
                                boolean useCache)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        baseClass - The default class to use for retrieving resources from the classpath.
        resourceFinder - The resource finder implementation.
        useCache - If true, retrieved resources are stored in an in-memory cache for fast lookup.

      • ClasspathResourceManager

        public ClasspathResourceManager(Class<?> baseClass)
        Constructor.

        Uses default ClasspathResourceFinderBasic for finding resources.

        Parameters:
        baseClass - The default class to use for retrieving resources from the classpath.

    • Method Detail

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream(String name)
                      throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        Returns:
        An input stream to the object, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream(String name,
                             Locale locale)
                      throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name for the specified locale and returns it as an input stream.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        locale - The locale. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An input stream to the object, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream(Class<?> baseClass,
                             String name,
                             Locale locale)
                      throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name for the specified locale and returns it as an input stream.
        Parameters:
        baseClass - Overrides the default class to use for retrieving the classpath resource.
        If null, uses the base class passed in through the constructor of this class.
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        locale - The locale. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An input stream to the object, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • getString

        public String getString(String name)
                 throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name and converts it to a simple string.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        Returns:
        The resource converted to a string, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.
